comprehensive_overview: RDKit is an open-source toolkit for cheminformatics that provides a wide range of functionality for cheminformatics, including molecular modeling, cheminformatics, and machine learning tools.
core_features: Some core features of RDKit include molecular fingerprinting, substructure searching, chemical similarity calculations, molecular property prediction, molecular similarity clustering, chemical reaction handling, 2D and 3D molecular visualization, and descriptor calculation.
